events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund case to agent Sarah, who handles returns and refunds in the support team.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo of the incorrect item sent to me instead of the product I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please keep the item, no need to return it.
I appreciate your quick response and solution offered. This refund process sounds great, thank you for making it easy.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the prompt assistance and friendly support.
Weâ€™re glad to hear this is resolved. Closing the case now. Please reach out if you need any further help.
A short survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback about your recent support experience with the refund process.
